body.name: Ambertronix 62" Tripod for iPhone, Selfie Stick Phone Tripod Professional Stable 4 Leg Quadrapod Design, Bluetooth Remote, 100% All Aluminum Stick & Legs, Lightweight, Portable All in One
body.stockDetail: Only 2 left in stock - order soon.

Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 5 hrs 13 mins
features: 2023 Upgraded Selfie Stick Tripod With New 4-leg Design: The latest Ambertronix professional selfie stick tripod combination. The first selfie stick with 4 ultra-stable legs. Take steady selfies or group photos with this reliable 4-leg phone mount.
62" Extra Large Telescoping Length: Up to 62" extended, 64" attached to phone holder. For unique photos and videos. Easy click to lock, fast and safe to use.

Upgrade High-Quality Bluetooth Remote For 2023: Take photos and videos up to 100 feet away, the highest in the industry. New and simple one-click operation. iPhone and Android compatible. The remote can hold 100,000 presses = (100,000 photos). The remote standby time is 3-5 years.

Multi-Angle Rotation for Creative Shots - Choose from horizontal or vertical camera modes with 270° neck and 360° phone holder rotation. Allows for the best camera angles and captures beautiful photos.
All In One Gift For All Ages: Selfie stick and tripod experience at the same time. Friendly customer service from Houston, Texas since 2006.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must have for your Bride that loves to take photos!!
reviews.reviewText: The Ambertronix 40” Selfie Stick has been an absolute game-changer, especially for my bride, who adores capturing memorable moments. This selfie stick has become an indispensable accessory for her photography endeavors.The 40-inch extension provides an excellent range, allowing her to capture wide-angle shots or include more background in her selfies. The adjustable holder securely accommodates various phone sizes, ensuring a snug fit and stability while taking pictures.Its lightweight and compact design make it easy to carry around, fitting conveniently in her bag or purse. The ease of use, coupled with its portability, has made it a go-to tool for impromptu photoshoots or capturing candid moments.The build quality feels durable and reliable. Despite multiple uses, the stick has held up well, maintaining its sturdiness without any signs of wear or instability.Moreover, the Bluetooth remote shutter feature is incredibly handy. It allows her to capture photos without having to physically touch her phone, ensuring smoother and more professional-looking shots.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Selfie Stick - better than most others!
reviews.reviewText: This selfie stick is a very well thought out product! Doubles as a tripod for impromptu moments when you need a hands free picture. The remote works pretty effectively and pairs fairly quickly and easily.As with almost any selfie stick, it is a bit delicate and can be damaged if not handled properly, but overall, this is one of the better sticks I've owned.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was surprised by how nice the selfie stick is. It’s really compact and easy to hold.Points taken away from the stand, it’s not sturdy and the little remote that connects to Bluetooth sometimes disconnects randomly.Bonus points for the light attachment. It’s a really nice feature. Overall really happy with the item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent value/sturdy tripod.
reviews.reviewText: I liked everything about this selfie stick except one thing which I already knew when I bought it. I do wish it was a little taller. But other than that it’s a very good selfie stick and works exactly as it should the four legs on the tripod make it very sturdy and steady And the lights work perfectly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Sleek and Easy to Use!
reviews.reviewText: As soon as I took it out of the package, I knew this would be worth the purchase! It's so compact and extends to make a perfect tripod or selfie stick. No more trying to prop my phone on odds and ends to get a good picture of me with my family! No more self-timer! I'm super excited to keep using this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sturdiness is an issue
reviews.reviewText: Price was great so I thought why not give it a try. The light worked great. The remote control worked great. Everything was great except that the wand when extended didn’t have much stability. My iPhone is an 11 MaxPro. It’s a bit heavy. The extended wand didn’t hold it well. It kept rotating either to the left or to the right. And it was hard to control. Maybe it would be great for a smaller phone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought 2 of these. One for me and one for my partner. When I travel for work without my partner and my dog, I like to video call them every night and have dinner together over video chat. We both use these during our video calls and I get to see my partner and my dog during dinner and before bed whenever I'm away from home! Great quality product. I love the light it comes with too so I don't really have to worry about the hotel room lighting being too low.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’m 5’10 and was worried about getting a tripod that was too short, I knew this was going to be right height wise and was not disappointed when it arrived. My only complaint is that it’s not the sturdiest. But I love it for the price.
